means: 巴塞尔（瑞士西北部城市，在莱茵河畔）

sentence.Network_en: The cities of Basel and Lausanne are also important manufacturing centres.

sentence.Network_en: SISYPHUS was lucky. He could have wound up on the Basel committee.

sentence.Network_en: The European Union has passed legislation to implement Basel 2 next year.
